channel.title: Axofx - bass/vocal effect, sampler and synth
channel.description: I'd like to share progress of my project with Axoloti. I've started it at the end of March and I'm extremely slow at it :slight_smile: . So, this was how it started: [https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/anyone-planning-to-make-and-sell-an-enclosure/140/194?u=igor](https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/anyone-planning-to-make-and-sell-an-enclosure/140/194?u=igor) What I'm trying to build is one device that will replace three devices I'm currently using with my band: Korg Kaossilator, Roland Voice Transformer and sample player I've built ([http://hyperglitch.com/articles/stmpler](http://hyperglitch.com/articles/stmpler)). It should process my microphone (two delays, lo-fi effect), my bass guitar (distortion, filter with LFO), play samples triggered by MIDI and be some sort of synth. Currently I have vocal effects partly done and sample player (this: [https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/configurable-sd-card-sample-player-object/1843?u=igor](https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/configurable-sd-card-sample-player-object/1843?u=igor)). UI consists of five pots, six buttons and eight LEDs connected directly to Axoloti. Small keyboard, rotary encoder, touchpad (not yet connected) and port for external sensors are connected to Arduino which also handles OLED display and communicates with Axoloti via UART. Short video: [https://youtu.be/LMg0mEQTYEk](https://youtu.be/LMg0mEQTYEk) Some pics: Video and pics were taken by small action camera so close parts are out of the focus. Source files can be found here: [https://bitbucket.org/igor_b/axofx/src](https://bitbucket.org/igor_b/axofx/src)

item.title: Axofx - bass/vocal effect, sampler and synth
item.dc:creator: @igor Igor B.
item.description:
@igor wrote:

I'd like to share progress of my project with Axoloti. I've started it at the end of March and I'm extremely slow at it .

So, this was how it started: https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/anyone-planning-to-make-and-sell-an-enclosure/140/194?u=igor

What I'm trying to build is one device that will replace three devices I'm currently using with my band: Korg Kaossilator, Roland Voice Transformer and sample player I've built (http://hyperglitch.com/articles/stmpler).

It should process my microphone (two delays, lo-fi effect), my bass guitar (distortion, filter with LFO), play samples triggered by MIDI and be some sort of synth. Currently I have vocal effects partly done and sample player (this: https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/configurable-sd-card-sample-player-object/1843?u=igor).

UI consists of five pots, six buttons and eight LEDs connected directly to Axoloti. Small keyboard, rotary encoder, touchpad (not yet connected) and port for external sensors are connected to Arduino which also handles OLED display and communicates with Axoloti via UART.

Short video:

Some pics:

FHD2417.JPG2000x1128 1.29 MB

FHD2413.JPG2000x1128 1.14 MB

FHD2420.JPG2000x1128 919 KB

FHD2427.JPG2000x1128 1.02 MB

Video and pics were taken by small action camera so close parts are out of the focus.

Source files can be found here: https://bitbucket.org/igor_b/axofx/src
